name: refresh-heroes
description: Fetch and update hero portraits from STRATZ API
instructions:
Run the hero fetch script to download or update hero portrait images. This should be run when:
1. Setting up the project for the first time
2. New heroes are added to Dota 2
3. Hero portraits need to be refreshed

Steps:
1. Ensure VITE_STRATZ_API_TOKEN is set in .env
2. Run: npm run fetch-heroes
3. Verify that public/heroes/ directory contains PNG files
4. Check console output for any failed downloads
